DOC.brief_summary: Randomized study 2 arm , without mask patient non small cell lung cancer , histologically cytologically confirm , liable surgery , stage IIIB IIIA , accord TNM classification American Joint Committee cancer . In one arm administer concomitant radiotherapy carboplatin-docetaxel-gemcitabine follow docetaxel , arm administer docetaxel-gemcitabine follow concurrent radiotherapy carboplatin-docetaxel
DOC.brief_title: Chemotherapy/Radiotherapy Versus Concomitant Chemotherapy Followed Radiotherapy Stage IIIB Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Unresectable stage IIIA B NSCLC patient WHO PS 0 1 Weight loss < 5 % within last 3 month At least one measurable lesion Planning CT scan previous randomization Written inform consent Malignant effusion , supraclavicular node SVCS PTV > 2000 cm3 V20 > 35 % FEV1 DLCO < 30 % 1 liter study entry
